message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $10,000. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the product's value, but $10,000 is unfortunately too far below my minimum asking price.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go lower than $11,500. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's worth to you is $10,000. What do you think?
